scripts.extract: npm run prisma:generate && cp package.json dist && cp .env dist/ && cp -R ../prisma dist/prisma && cp -R bin/ dist/bin && chmod +x dist/bin/stockfish
scripts.deploy:
tsc && npm run extract && gcloud functions deploy chess-analysis --runtime nodejs20 --memory 4096MB --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --source ./dist --no-gen2 --entry-point chessAnalysisFunction --set-env-vars=$(tr '
' ',' < ./config/production) --region europe-west1 --service-account 94517653133-compute@developer.gserviceaccount.com
